name: Idris Theorem
description:
Fight your way through dangerous ruins of ancient civiliazion and discover mistery of lost technology.

Forced to risk your life you must find and extract misterious cristals using the only weapon you have in your equipment. Watch out for deadly guards, just waiting for your mistake. One hit and you start over again.

Don't give up and fight to the last battle.

Features
  • story to be discovered
  • action gun fights
  • one hit kill
  • boss fight
  • disturbing atmosphere
Controls
  • WSAD + mouse aim + mouse left and right button  -  character in gameplay control
  • WSAD + Enter + Esc or mouse - in menu controls
Credits

All music and sound credits are listed in game.

I hope you will have fun!

Any feedback much appreciated.
